select dgp.pipeline_id, dgp.app_id, dgp.pipeline_create_user_id, dgp.commit_id, dgp.status, dgp.stage, dgp.pipeline_creation_date, dgc.user_id commitUserId, dgc.commit_sha sha, dgc.commit_content content, dgc.ref from devops_gitlab_pipeline dgp LEFT JOIN devops_gitlab_commit dgc on dgp.commit_id = dgc.id where dgp.app_id = #{appId}
AND dgp.pipeline_creation_date >= CONCAT('','${startTime}',' 00:00:00')
AND dgp.pipeline_creation_date <= CONCAT('','${endTime}',' 23:59:59')
order by dgp.pipeline_creation_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM devops_gitlab_pipeline WHERE commit_id is null
mapper.select: SELECT dgp.pipeline_id, dgp.app_id, dgp.pipeline_create_user_id, dgp.commit_id, dgp.status, dgp.stage, dgp.pipeline_creation_date, dgc.user_id commitUserId, dgc.commit_sha sha, dgc.commit_content content, dgc.ref FROM devops_gitlab_pipeline dgp LEFT JOIN devops_gitlab_commit dgc ON dgp.commit_id = dgc.id WHERE dgc.ref = #{branch} AND dgp.app_id = #{appId} ORDER BY dgp.id DESC LIMIT 10
